channel.title: [pi] Help with mystery box system? [pi]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been looking for tuts on how to add some kind of mystery box system where it gives random rewards, but when they tell me to search for something in client.java, it comes up as: [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/Alister777/uhhh.jpg[/img]
And I'm using Insidiax v8 source + client sooo... yeah. Any help here please?
